tool_description: Good Quotes allows you to get popular or random quotes and filter them by different categories and keywords.
name: Good Quotes
title: Good Quotes

api_list.name: Daily Quote
api_list.description: Retrieve the quote of the day.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://good-quotes3.p.rapidapi.com/daily"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "good-quotes3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Show Quote
api_list.description: Retrieve a single quote by its ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://good-quotes3.p.rapidapi.com/15IOCbd9"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "good-quotes3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://good-quotes3.p.rapidapi.com/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "good-quotes3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Index Quotes
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of paginated quotes based on optional filtering parameters.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Search for quotes containing the given query.

optional_parameters.name: tags[]
optional_parameters.description: Filter quotes by tags, if there are multiple tags it will return quotes that contain any of the tags.

api_list.name: Random Quotes
api_list.description: Retrieve random quotes based on optional filtering parameters.

optional_parameters.name: tags[]
optional_parameters.description: Filter quotes by tags, if there are multiple tags it will return quotes that contain any of the tags.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Search for quotes containing the given query.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Number of random quotes to retrieve (default: 1).
